attributes.action: Award a medal/cross/plaque to the next of kin of those who have lost their lives on active service.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At the present, no medal, cross or plaque is awarded to the parents/next-of-kin of those soldiers who have lost their lives on active service, as was the case in WW1 & WW2 with the Memorial Cross and Memorial Plaque.  It is felt that there should be an award for those parents/next-of-kin of Soldiers/Sailors/Airman who have made the ultimate sacrifice.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
